title: How to Make Finnish Lohikeitto

steps.headline: Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a stockpot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
Sauté the leeks for 5 minutes until they have softened, stirring occasionally with a plastic spoon.
Pour the water into a stockpot or Dutch oven.
Add the potatoes, onions, salt and pepper to the pot.
Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook it for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the salmon slices, cream and dill and cook for another 5 minutes.
Add the remaining tablespoon of butter and stir the soup until the butter has melted.
Find the bay leaf, scoop it out and discard it.
Serve the soup and garnish it by sprinkling it with additional fresh dill.

text: Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a stockpot or Dutch oven over medium heat.  Sauté the leeks for 5 minutes until they have softened, stirring occasionally with a plastic spoon.  Pour the water into a stockpot or Dutch oven.  Add the potatoes, onions, salt and pepper to the pot.  Bring the mixture to a simmer and cook it for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.  Add the salmon slices, cream and dill and cook for another 5 minutes.  Add the remaining tablespoon of butter and stir the soup until the butter has melted.  Find the bay leaf, scoop it out and discard it.  Serve the soup and garnish it by sprinkling it with additional fresh dill.
